content: this is a summary of a legal case involving the coownership of a property the case started in the county court varaždin and then went to the municipal court supetar the procedure has been ongoing for 3 years and 1 month the final resolution states that the coownership of the property has been dissolved the petitioner e g has acquired ownership of a coownership share previously held by party k g after the dissolution e g becomes the sole owner of the property the court used specific articles of the property act to make this decision the court determined the ownership based on the cadastral parcel number the petitioner owned 910 of the property and the opposing party owned 110 the court conducted an expert examination to determine the market value of the property the opposing party was entitled to receive payment for their coownership share the court decided to dissolve the coownership and make the petitioner the sole owner ordering the opposing party to pay a specific amount the opposing partys appeal was rejected and the decision of the firstinstance court was confirmed
